title: Valid CREAM Tokens Which Can Be Voted
body:
All CREAM Tokens held in a wallet at the START TIME of a Snapshot Proposal Vote can be voted in a Proposal.

Adopting such a rule will allow for community members to contemplate their CREAM-holdings needs for upcoming votes in a fair and transparent manner.

This would, effectively, give prospective voters the time to purchase, borrow, and/or un-stake CREAM tokens in preparation for upcoming Snapshot proposals votes from the time a Proposal is submitted to Snapshot until the block immediately prior to the start time a proposal is set to become active.

VOTE FOR:
Adopt the proposed new rule

VOTE AGAINST:
Do not adopt the proposed new rule; Do Nothing.
author: 0xB1AdceddB2941033a090dD166a462fe1c2029484
